verbLexeme: 1. To deliberately and unlawfully kill a person. English = murder.
2. To kill a person in a violent way. Formal English = slay.
3. To cut or slit a throat.
nominalLexeme: 1. The deliberate and unlawful killing of a person. English = murder.
2. A person who deliberately and unlawfully kills a person. English = murderer.
3. A cut or a slit on a throat.
